help-file.title: BEASTMASTER
help-file.content:
A Beastmaster is a multi-class Shaman/Druid.
Notes on Beastmaster: Shamans use totems, and memorize spells without spellbooks. Druids commune, which is heavilly based on terrain, for both spells and commune times. If you start as a Druid, you will commune all of your spells. If you start as a Shaman, you will memorize spells, but you will no longer need totems, for ANY of your spells.
